mapper.insert: insert into employee (userid, usernm, deptcode, positioncode, rankcode, continuousyear, relate, joincompany, birthdate, password) values (#{userid},#{usernm},#{deptcode},#{positioncode} ,#{rankcode},#{continuousyear},#{relate},#{joincompany},sysdate,#{password})
mapper.select: select userid, usernm, deptcode, positioncode, rankcode, continuousyear, relate, joincompany, birthdate, password from employee
select userid, usernm, deptcode, positioncode, rankcode, continuousyear, relate, joincompany, birthdate, password from employee where userid = #{userid}
